MS MCQs

    Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management

    »

    1. How does Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management help organizations realize business value?

      It can transform manufacturing and supply chain operations using predictive analytics.

      The application provides camera monitoring for warehouse storage.

      The application enables employees to manufacture goods that meet regulatory standards.


    2. Which of the following items best describes what Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management enables organizations to do?

      Hire new employees smarter and faster and improve employee retention.

      Automate and streamline supply chain and optimize production performance.

      Use AI to determine employee performance, training programs, and customize benefits.


    3. Which of the following items best describes how Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management helps organizations optimize production performance?

      Provide training for maintenance workers.

      Social media integration enables employees to collaborate efficiently to solve supply chain issues.

      Identify potential machine issues and prevent downtime.


    4. Which of the following items best describes how Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management enables organizations to innovate with intelligent manufacturing?

      Schedule employee shifts to ensure warehouses are fully staffed.

      Simplify resource management and accelerate product delivery.

      Allow users to create virtual tours of warehouse operations.
